trans-unit.source: Represents a metadata attribute for an item in the [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] metadata hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 代表中繼資料屬性中的項目[!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)]中繼資料階層。

trans-unit.source: You can access every item in the [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] metadata hierarchy as a strongly typed property bag.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取每個項目中的[!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)]當做強型別的屬性包的中繼資料階層。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class provides properties called <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>類別提供屬性，稱為<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A>，依此類推。</xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class also inherits a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> property, which is a collection of MetadataProperty objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>類別也會繼承<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A>屬性，這是 MetadataProperty 物件的集合。</xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>

trans-unit.source: When the application creates an instance of the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class, the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> property automatically contains a collection of MetadataProperty objects for <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A> property, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A> property, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式建立的執行個體<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>類別，<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A>屬性會自動包含物件集合之 MetadataProperty<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A>屬性，依此類推。</xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>

trans-unit.source: Gets the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個內建型別種類<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"></xref> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"> </xref>物件，表示這個內建型別種類<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> class that contains both the type of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref> and facets for the type.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>類別，其中包含這個類型<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref>以及型別的 facet。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object that contains both the type of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref> and facets for the type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> </xref>物件，其中包含這個類型<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty"></xref>以及型別的 facet。
